questions.text: it is said that sharks as a rule do not eat what type of animal?
what number is Odder known as?
what is the name of Odder's favorite companion?
what does Kairi say to Odder when Odder asks play or eat first?
questions.answer: First we eat and then we play

questions.text: what is the name of the bay that is a little scary to some, but a place Odder thinks is worth the scare because there are succulent crabs there?
why does Odder say she wants to be close to a kayaker?
how many times has Odder been trapped and relocated to quiet waters away from humans?
what does "the fifty" reference in the story of "THE FIFTY"?
questions.answer: That at one time there were only 50 sea otters left

questions.text: how long can a sea otter stay underwater?
what does Odder do when Kairi is nipped by a great white shark?
questions.answer: Swims towards the shark and begins hurling herself at him

questions.text: after Odder is bitten by a young shark, where is she taken?
what are the people called who take care of Odder at Highwater?
what do the aquarists do to try and save Odder?
what part of Odder's mom's body did she sleep on as a pup?
what did Odder's mom do to keep her safe while she was diving for food?
questions.answer: Tied/looped/leashed her to strands of kelp

questions.text: how many hairs per square inch is a sea otter said to have?
questions.answer: A million hairs per square inch

questions.text: what happens to cause Odder and her mother to become separated?
what are the names of the elder sea otters who decide to be kind to Odder?
what do Gracie and Holly tell Odder it is best to be: a name or a number?
what does Odder call the humans taking care of her until Gracie and Holly inform her of what they are really called?
what does Odder find out has happened to Kairi from Gracie and Holly?
questions.answer: That she had a stillborn pup and that she has the shaking sickness

questions.text: what name is given to Odder at Highwater when she returns there for rehabilitation after the shark attack?
when Odder discovers Kairi is at Highwater, what does Odder discover has also been given to Kairi to take care of at Highwater?
what does Odder always say is an otter's purpose?
what does Odder do for 3 days with the pup that has been placed in the tank with her?
how long does it take before the pup that Odder taught is released into the wild?
does a 3-year-old sea otter get bit by a shark?
are humans called "animals" and are trying to rescue a marine animal?
do we find a character called Kairi?
do we read about two settings: a marine rehabilitation center and the ocean?
does a mother and her pup get separated during a storm?
do aquarists wear "disguises" so the animals will not get too attached to them?
are young pups placed with adults who are not their mothers?
is it said that the whole purpose of life is to play?
